name: Cubo Rush
description:
A fresh twist on the classic endless runner game. Players can compete against their Facebook friends or in single-player mode to ‘drive’ the retro Cube Truck through a colourful 3D pixel world, swiping left and right to avoid obstacles and collect power-ups.

Instructions - how to play:
Cubo Rush™ is easy to pick up and immediately start playing.

Goal: Guide your Retro Truck safely through the obstacle course!
Swipe left and right to avoid cones, barriers, or crazy cows!
Collect Cubo Points to exchange for cosmetic upgrades.
Play against your social media friends and compete on the leaderboard.

Main Features:
Wonderful Art Style: Colour, retro, 3D pixel world with a nostalgic soundtrack
Fun Gameplay: Challenge your instincts to race for as long as possible
Power-Ups: Collect crazy fun abilities like Flight on the track!
New Vehicles: Unlock new Retro Cubo Trucks for a different look with Cubo Points!
Keep Playing: Crashed? Try again, revive yourself and keep going.

Don’t wait, download the app, hit the track, earn the best score, and challenge your friends!
